short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Write your own adventure game book with links to entry numbers and export to html.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wanted to write your own adventure book games? Those that ask you to go to an specific page depending on what you decide? This tool helps you accomplish that!

It helps you creating entries for the adventure and generates a tree indicating the entries that are pending to finish.

It's in alpha version yet and a lot of ideas are yet to be done!
